EditorData.NodeContext: gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic

EditorData.stateContext: Doesn't necessarily play on seeing boat. Wulbren could use this line without freeing the tieflings or after freeing the tieflings, for instance.

Text.Value: Damned chains! I've almost got it.

EditorData.NodeContext: gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic

Text.Value: Stop dawdling - get to the boat, or I'll leave you behind!

EditorData.NodeContext: yelling at player to end the combat, or he;ll leave without him

EditorData.stateContext: Guards have sounded the alarm. The prisoners hear this.

Text.Value: It's too late - we have to leave.

EditorData.NodeContext: leaving player behind to save his own skin - shouted with urgency. Resigned to the player's death.

EditorData.stateContext: If a character was on the way to the boat and couldn't leave because of various reasons,

Text.Value: I need to be in the city - not twiddling my thumbs here.

EditorData.NodeContext: tense as he waits, aware guards could come by at any moment
vanishes into the night, and safety, as he flees his captors

EditorData.stateContext: IN COMBAT. One person signals that they have to defend the boat.

Text.Value: Argh, what god did I shit on to deserve this? Move it - they'll be on us soon.

EditorData.NodeContext: alarms have just started blaring in the middle of his escape, knows guards will be here soon

Text.Value: Blast it all - a dead end. There must be another way out.

EditorData.NodeContext: come to a pier with a sea of water he can't cross, looking for another way out
tense as he waits, aware guards could come by at any moment

EditorData.stateContext: IN COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under a LOT of stress.

Text.Value: I won't die here, damn it. I refuse!

EditorData.NodeContext: running for his life through a prison filled with enemies
player is in combat, wulbren has finally untied the boat and they are ready to flee

Text.Value: The pier over there is our way out. We'll escape right under the bastards' noses.

EditorData.NodeContext: Authorative and commanding. Sees a pier, and boat, and his way to freedom as he runs for his life.

EditorData.stateContext: Character is about to disappear out of sight outside the tower, past the docks area.
OUT OF COMBAT. Another character is nearby and this character is idling by.

EditorData.logicalname: WULBREN: Boat leaves after this line

Text.Value: You think you can take on the Ironhand Gnomes?! Just try reach the boat!

EditorData.stateContext: OUT OF COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under stress.

Text.Value: I must make it to Baldur's Gate - I must.

EditorData.NodeContext: running for his life through a prison filled with enemies

EditorData.stateContext: OUT OF COMBAT. Running for their life to whatever escape point they may reach. It could be the boat, it could be the pier outside.

EditorData.NodeContext: player is in combat, yelling for player to finish the fight or he'll leave without player
Grim and determined - trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat.

Text.Value: This thing is chained up tight - hold on.

EditorData.NodeContext: Grim and determined - trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat.

Text.Value: Is the boat going or not?

Synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers.
